content: The **Singapore [Baptist](/wiki/Baptist) Convention** is a [Baptist](/wiki/Baptist) [Christian denomination](/wiki/Christian_denomination) in Singapore. It is affiliated to the [Asia Pacific Baptist Federation](/wiki/Asia_Pacific_Baptist_Federation) and the [Baptist World Alliance](/wiki/Baptist_World_Alliance). ## History The Convention has its origins in a Chinese mission in 1905. The Swatow Baptist Church in Singapore (Thomson Road Baptist Church) was founded in 1937. In 1965, churches became members of the [Malaysia Baptist Convention](/wiki/Malaysia_Baptist_Convention). In 1971, the Singapore Baptist Churches Fellowship was founded. It was established on 28 December 1974. It founded the Baptist Theological Seminary, Singapore in 1983. According to a Convention census released in 2023, it claimed 9,200 members and 37 churches. - Singapore Baptist Convention - Official Website This article about [Baptist Christianity](/wiki/Baptists) is a stub.
